channel.description: Recent content in goals on See Fan Go

item.title: Looking Ahead to 2023
item.description: I wrote about checking off goals earlier this year: 🚀 Goals for 2022 💪 Hit a one plate bench 🍅 Harvest many tomatoes 💞 Train the cats to go for walks 👩‍🍳 Master one dish from each continent ✍️ Start a (non-tech) blog Unfortunately, we found out the hard way that the Nacho cat hates the outdoors even more than the Taco cat, so they will remain indoors and unwalked. A better goal would probably have been to play more with them.
